content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (-9.5, 24.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5), pipe (position -9.5, 23.5), and pipe (position -9.5, 22.5).

### Copper plate factory at position (1, 1)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 1.0, 1.0) and a furnace (position 10.0, 1.0)
- Assembling machine (position 8.5, 1.5) and burner inserter (position 8.5, 1.5) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 1) that connects the furnace at position 1.0 to the assembling machine at position 8.5

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing new electric poles
- Ensure that the target location for placing electric poles is clear of any blocking entities or terrain that is unplaceable (such as water).

### Errors when retrieving entities
- Verify that the entity you are trying to retrieve exists at the specified position before attempting to access it. In this case, ensure that there is a steam engine at position (10.0, 0.0) before calling `get_entity`.
